wishText: If I were to count the ways I love you, I would run out of numbers. If I were to measure how much I adore you, no ruler in the world would be long enough. You are the reason I wake up with a smile, the reason my heart beats a little faster when I hear your voice. Loving you is not just something I do; it is who I am, who I have become, and who I always want to be ğŸ’
